glsa.title: Ampache: Insecure temporary file usage
glsa.synopsis: An insecure temporary file usage has been reported in Ampache, allowing for symlink attacks.

background.p: Ampache is a PHP based tool for managing, updating and playing audio files via a web interface.

description.p: Dmitry E. Oboukhov reported an insecure temporary file usage within the gather-messages.sh script.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Ampache users should upgrade to the latest version:
